items.title: Data File
items.description: Data in CSV, TSV etc. format supported by readr.

items.title: Delimiter Character
items.description: Single character used to separate fields within a record. Leave blank to read whitespace-separated columns.

items.title: Column Types
items.description: A compact string representation where each character represents one column: c = character, i = integer, n = number, d = double, l = logical, D = date, T = date time, t = time, ? = guess, or _/- to skip the column.

items.title: Identifier Column Name
items.description: Name of the column containing the IDs

items.title: Entity Type
items.description: Specify what these data relate to (Participant, Instrument, Area etc.)
